channel.title: Microservices on Vishnu Bharathi
channel.description: Recent content in Microservices on Vishnu Bharathi

item.title: Vertx First Attempt
item.description: Ever since I decided to learn about the Java Ecosystem, I have been wanting to try out something practical. May be write a small app in Java and see how the experience would be. I came across a framework called Eclipse Vert.x few months back and decided to give it a try. So I ended up reading its documentation for few weekends and today morning. I am feeling a bit comfortable to write some code on Vert.
